Hackerspaces and Makerspaces in Finland  

Opening of a new hacklab in Lahti

25 November 2017

A new hackerspace arranges an opening event in Lahti in December! Open doors are already running every Wednesday on 18:00. Address: Sammonaktu 8 H, entrance from Kauppakatu side. Everyone are welcome to join the new hacklab! ...

Read more

hacklab.fi – hackerspaces and makerspaces in Finland.

A co-operation network between independent and open workspaces. All our member groups are non-profit organizations operated by their members.

You can contact us on IRC, channel #hacklab.fi in Freenode network.
